message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $90. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
